**Job Description**
-------------------


We are looking for skilled software engineers who will be responsible for working on projects that are currently being developed on by our company. Duties will include but are not limited to developing and directing software system validation and testing methods, as well as directing our software programming initiatives. You will also be working closely with clients and cross-functional departments to communicate project status and proposals.

  

A bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or another related field is required. You will also need at least five to seven years of software engineering or software development experience, preferably in a related field to be successful in this role.

  

  

### **Requirements**

* **5 + Years**of Ruby and Rails or significantly similar language and platforms.
* Willingness to learn from and share knowledge with the rest of the team.
* Solid understanding of standard programming techniques.
* Material experience writing, (unit) testing, debugging, deploying, and maintaining web-based applications.
* Confidence using software version control systems.
* Awareness of AWS product offerings and deployment mechanisms.
* Understanding of software development processes and methods including Agile/Lean values and principles.
* Understanding of and experience with different data storage mechanisms, including RDBMS (specifically PostgreSQL) and key/value cache (specifically Redis).
* Experience with message-based systems (message bus, message streaming, pub/sub, etc.).
* Knowledge of GraphQL-based or RESTful API usage and/or design.
* Experience with GIS software (PostGIS, shapefiles, KML, MapServer, OpenLayers, Google Maps Platform).
* Experience with data analytics and reporting systems.
* Experience working with identity platforms like Okta and Auth0
* Experience in IoT development.
* GPS device or other embedded systems/hardware background.
* Experience with any of the following: Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, Resque, RESTful services, GraphQL.

title: Software Development Engineer
description:
LOOKING FOR NEW HIRE TO START IMMEDIATELY

  

About Streampage

  

Come join our growing team. Streampage is changing the way businesses communicate with prospects and customers. Our company continues to double in size each year. 100% covered healthcare and other perks. Flexible work hours and environment. Lots of opportunities for growth.

  

The Work

  

Hours: Full-Time, Monday-Friday, Salaried

  

We’re seeking experienced, passionate developers to join our team. You’ll become part of a cohesive group of developers who strive to build unique and innovative systems that help businesses communicate effectively with customers and prospects. You’ll obtain invaluable experience developing pieces of a system known throughout North America.

  

We are looking for a Back-End Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your coworkers into the application. A basic understanding of front-end technologies is therefore necessary as well.

  

To fit into our team you need to be energetic, driven, passionate at software development, test driven and have a mind to architect solutions. A strong desire to meet and set realistic timelines and document solutions thoroughly. In addition the ability to collaborate well in a cross-functional team of designers, developers and leaders.

  

Expertise

  

Who we're looking for:

  

* Excellent problem solving skills using PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Javascript, HTML, CSS
* Work experience with Git/Github
* Excellent coding skills and programming knowledge
* Excellent communication skills, ability to work within a structured team environment, ability to manage expectations
* Ability to prioritize a heavy workload, meet deadlines, and manage goals
* A good sense of humor and the ability to give/take constructive criticism
* Self-driven with the desire to surround yourself with like-minded people
* 5+ years of PHP Developer experience
* MVC Experience

  

Ideally you possess:

  

* Laravel Experience
* Software Architecture Design Skills
* Email Deliverability Experience
* MySQL Experience
* API Experience

  

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
